### 提取 index 癌症 多原发癌
all_cancer_file <- read.table("/home/luohh/UKB50wMultiPcancer/01.data/04.sampleData/04.cancerGroup/03.whiteData/allfile.list")
for(myfile in all_cancer_file$V1){
  cancer_type <- unlist(strsplit(myfile,split = "[.]"))[1]
  index_cancer_sample <- read.table(paste("/home/luohh/UKB50wMultiPcancer/01.data/04.sampleData/04.cancerGroup/03.whiteData/",myfile,sep = ""))
  filter_cancer_sample <- intersect(index_cancer_sample$V1,allPcancer.sample$V1)
  write.table(filter_cancer_sample,paste("/home/luohh/UKB50wMultiPcancer/01.data/04.sampleData/07.SpecificMPC/",cancer_type,'.mpc.sample',sep = ""),row.names = F,col.names = F,quote = F)
}
